# Template Repository

This repository is designed to be used as a **GitHub template**. Click "Use this template" to create your own agentic workflow repository.

## What's included

- Pre-built GitHub Actions workflows for issue triage, PR review, and release notes
- MCP server with example tools (GitHub API, web search, file analysis)
- Agent scaffold that connects to MCP servers
- Comprehensive documentation

## After creating from template

1. Update `README.md` with your project info
2. Configure repository secrets (see [docs/setup.md](../docs/setup.md))
3. Customize workflows for your needs (see [docs/customization.md](../docs/customization.md))
4. Add your own MCP tools (see [docs/adding-tools.md](../docs/adding-tools.md))
